BasicInfo.short: Education Elements helps districts and schools develop and implement personalized learning strategies.

Products.name: Hybrid Learning Management System
Products.description: The Hybrid Learning Management System (HLMS) is a cloud-based technology platform developed by Education Elements .

Products.name: eTester
Products.description: We are an enabler for colleges and institutes that want to embrace technology teach and help students prepare best for a challenging world.

Products.name: Highlight
Products.description: Highlight is a personalized learning platform. It provides students with single sign-on and teachers with actionable data.
